body.name: Panda Portable Washing Machine 10 LBS Load Volume, Fully Automatic 1.34 Cu.ft Laundry Washer with Built-in Drain Pump, Top Load Clothes Washer for Apartment and Household
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 15 hrs 36 mins
features: 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐖𝐚𝐬𝐡𝐞𝐫-Our Panda portable washer provides 4 impressive multifunctions that meet all your laundry needs: Soak, Wash, Rinse, and Spin. The compact size (19”D x 20”W x 34”H) makes it ideal for apartments, condominiums, RVs, or other small living spaces.

𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐕𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐦𝐞 & 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬-𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐞𝐥-Panda 1.34 Cu.Ft. portable laundry washer features a durable, chipping and rust resistant stainless steel, enables it to hold up to a large volume of 10 Lbs. of clothes. You can monitor the clothes washing condition from the unique sapphire blue transparent and foldable lid.

𝟏𝟎 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐬 & 𝟓 𝐖𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐬: It offers 10 flexible washing programs for you: Normal, Standard, Quick Wash, Heavy Duty, Soak & Wash, Wash, Wash& Rinse, Rinse & Spin, Spin and Air dry, choose your desired program by simply pressing a button and let it do the job automatically. 5 water levels are available:1/22L 2/24L 3/28L 4/30L 5/33L, which saves your bill.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥𝐲 A𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜- Hook up the water inlet hose with the provided connector directly to your faucet and hang up the drain hose to a sink or basin, then select the washing program and turn on your faucet, this amazing washer will automatically do its job for you.

𝐀𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬- Our Panda compact washer is designed thoughtfully for you and your family with additional features as child lock protection and delay start function, together with auto unbalance detection technology to make sure that you have a pleasant laundry job experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Panda Model PAN356HB Color of body Light Grey Color of lid Sapphire Blue Volume Capacity 1.34 cu.ft. / 10 lbs Voltage 110V-120V Power 330W Programs 10 Water Level 5 Tub Material Stainless Steel Product Dimensions (inch) 19 (L) x 19 (W) x 33.5 (H) Length of inlet hose (inch) 39 Length of drain hose (inch) 55 Weight 51 lbs

INLET HOSE AND QUICK ADAPTER This model only has one water inlet that can connected to standard faucet using the inlet hose and quick adapter in the package. CONNECT TO MACHINE The machine will automatically fill water and stop filling water, so the machine must be connected to faucet using the inlet hose and quick adpter. Manually adding water into the machine is not allowed, otherwise, the machine will not work properly. CONNECT TO FAUCET The quick adapter has both internal thread (diameter ≈ 13/16") and external thread (diameter ≈ 7/8") that can fit for standart faucets in US. Remove the aerator of the faucet, screw the quick adapter on, and connect the inlet hose to the quick adapter. Adjust the water temperature on the faucet. Please keep the faucet on during the whole cycle.

Please acknowledge before purchasing: *This machine only has ONE water inlet that can be connected to a standard faucet using the inlet hose and quick adapter in the package Please adjust water temperature by the faucet. **To ensure the quality of products 2% of the machines were water tested by the manufacturer before transporting to our warehouse so you will have chance to see water mark or water left outside or inside the machine. ***When unpacking the machine you might see a black rectangle plastic piece located at the bottom of the machine please remove it before using the machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Machine and Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This machine is great in all the ways people have described it in the other reviews (washes well, quiet, good capacity, etc...) so I will just say that those things are true and move on to some other things about the unit. :DThe construction is very well done and the strange amber colored top is actually really stylish and practicle in practice. I didn't expect to like that color because it is kind of out of the ordinary, but it actually looks really nice in my bathroom next to the sink as odd as that sound. lol The next thing I'd mention is that the machine is really simply made and super servicable. Others had mentioned that there was a tube that came undone from the basket assembly, so I wanted to verify mine was going to be good. There is a service door on the back of the unit that comes off with 4 screws. I can definitely see why they thought that the hoses might have leaked... the assembly really moves around when it's washing! I my case though it looked really secure and seemed to have some glue as well as a spring time hose clamp. I actually think a spring type is a really smart choice because I feel like the vibrations of the motor could wiggle screw type clamps lose. I think there was plenty of space for both though, so I will probably throw on a screw type hose clamp behind the spring clamp to be safe.Ultimately, I think it is an incredibly well executed, incredibly functional washing machine that is sturdy and will last me a lot of years. At the same time, keep in mind that it is essentially just like any other washing machine and failures in washing machines tend to result in leaks/flooding. No washing machine will avoid this, that is why they have a drain/drain pan below them in laundry rooms... so try to plan for this. I'll be adding a water collection pan below it with a little flood sensor to warn me when something is wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Panda washing machine is really wonderful. Great size for my apartment bathroom.1. Super quiet. I was so surprised at how powerful yet quiet this machine is. Unless you are right next to it, you don’t hear it during any of the cycles. (see video)2. Strong pump. Water flows right out during the 2 rinse cycles & spin cycle. Clothes are barely damp when wash is done (see photo)3. Controls are easy to understand & use. Multiple water levels to choose from. Multiple functional options. I like that it flashes the time remaining & cycle code throughout the wash.4. Easy to hook up to my bathroom sink. The adapter is easy to couple/uncouple & it’s 100% leak proof. No issues.5. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Cleaning. First rinse cycle, water is dirty. Second rinse cycle, water is clean. Spin cycle, water is crystal clear. Super job washing.The one issue I have is the hose will fly out of the sink while draining if you do not secure it somehow. I saw a review where the used a pot cover to hold/weigh down the hose in the sink. This is a good temporary solution for me.( see photo) I will be looking for some kind of weight that I can secure to the hose as a permanent solution. If Panda can solve this problem, the machine would be perfect.I bought the Washer & Dolly package. The dolly’s wheel struggle with the 50# machine. Does not roll well. I have to lean into it to push it the 4ft to the sink & back. It’s ok, but not great. Just an fyiI really love my Panda Washer. It is going to pay for itself in offset laundromat costs within 6 months. I am so happy I can do my laundry at home, now. This machine has easily handles daily clothes, a load if towels & a load of sweaters, no problem. It’s a workhorse.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Panda Panda PANDA!!!
reviews.reviewText: I live in an apartment without washer/dryer connections. About 4 years ago I purchased a portable sink washer (The Laundry Alternative) and a small unit Panda dryer. I had so many issues with the washing machine and when I found it was time to replace it, I looked at my dryer that was more than reliable and decided to order this washing machine. For one, I also ordered an upgrade on my dryer too.1. Easy installation. However, the draining tube is designed to go on a utility sink and hang directly off of it so with some maneuvering and duct tape rigged it up on my sink just fine. I don't move it from the sink I use for my laundry room so it's fine where it is. I don't see that being a problem for everyone but I'm special so......2. The connection to the sink -- the faucet was no issue but hooking onto the machine had a slight issue because it has to be super tight so as to not leak. It did leak out a small amount and so we had to tighten it up.3. The floor is uneven but it has adjustable feet and so it is not an issue.4. This thing has space galore, the tub is as big as the washers in my apartment laundry facility. I have to use the water level at 3 so not to fill up my sink and have overflow but if I were to use a kitchen sink or utility sink instead of a vanity sink it wouldn't be an issue.5. I totally forgot the washer was going it is so quiet compared to the other machine. Completely awesome.5. This machine has so many more functions than other portable/sink washers. It has a soak cycle.... it has a compartment for fabric softener instead of having to stop the machine at a certain point in the cycle.6. The lint catcher -- OMG -- the other ones always have this little net baggy that hangs out to catch the lint but eventually tears off and you can never find replacements for those parts and all the lint catchers you throw in with a cycle suck.... BUT this one is a rectangle box that will not tear off, and can only be broken by being too rough with removing it. So happy about this you just don't know!!7. The lid is super cool, it folds in so it's not in your way. It also won't let the machine run with the lid open which is great especially if you have young kids around. The lid is also well above the action so it doesn't get dirty from the wash.What can I say I love this machine and am really overwhelmed with how great it is!
